original_text: Then the Lord gave Elijah special power. Elijah tied his robe into his belt and he ran all the way to Jezreel. Ahab followed him.
korean_text: 여호와의 능력이 엘리야에게 임하매 그가 허리를 동이고 이스르엘로 들어가는 곳까지 아합 앞에서 달려갔더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord gave Elijah special power
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주님께서 엘리야에게 특별한 힘을 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Elijah tied his robe into his belt
and he ran all the way to Jezreel
